quotes.quote: You should just say no to drugs. That will drive the prices down.
Alcoholism and drug addiction are killer of mental and physical health. Alcoholic and drug addicts are killing themselves slowly.
Psychedelic drugs are the false friend of the human mind, and a hidden killer of the drug addicts.
Drug addiction reduces a man to a mindless and ridiculous thing, and creates social parasites and criminals.
The drug addict loses the sense of dignity, responsibility, self- esteem and self- respect, and he forgets how to live like a human being.
Reality is just a crutch for people who can't handle drugs.
I was, I am and I always will be a drug addict. A person who gets involved in drugs has to fight it everyday.
The greatest mistake in life is to get addicted to drugs becoming a prisoner of ecstasy and hallucination, and less of a man.
Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with with your self esteem.
Drug addiction is a self- punishing disease that ruins mental, psychological and physical health.
Drugs have taught an entire generation of American kids the metric system.
The drug addict does not care about what is important or worthwhile in life, such as family, career, finance, and social relationship.
People try drugs out of curiosity, to have a good time, to improve athletic performance, or to escape from stress, anxiety or depression, but all drug addicts are willful victims themselves.
Sometimes becoming drug free has less to do with addiction and more to do with sanity.
But I will say that the drugs are much more ferocious then they used to be. There are people wrecking their lives with addiction, which seems much more severe.
Human beings would be better and more respectable if drug addicts had not been born.
I much prefer to be high on life than in it.
The drug addict is his own enemy slowly killing himself using drugs as a weapon.
Drugs are merely the most obvious form of addiction in our society. Drug addiction is one of the things that undermines traditional values.
Don't do drugs because if you do drugs you'll go to prison, and drugs are really expensive in prison.
